Name: Miami Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: The merest hint of mint in a refreshing Daiquiri with a dry finish.
Nutrition: One serving of Miami Daiquiri contains 163 calories
